pages.text: Powdering milk is a great way to store it efficiently, either in a cellar or for long journeys. $(br2)The first step to making Powdered Milk is making $(thing)Condensed Milk$().$(br2)Then, the Condensed Milk is further boiled into $(thing)Milk Flakes$(). If you keep the fire going, this will happen automatically.
Finally, the Milk Flakes can be ground into Powdered Milk using a $(l:tfc:mechanics/quern)Quern$().
Powdered Milk can then be recombined with water at any subsequent point to create Milk.
